4693.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr:
The Terms of Service page of the New York Times website displays a last updated date on the top of the terms. 
For example: 

Last updated on May 24, 2018
This page describes the terms and conditions...
